content: this legal text summarizes a case involving multiple parties and the division of assets the parties are referred to by their initials the case is about the ownership of real estate units in a building in municipality castelfidardo the details of the properties including their size and location are provided the resolution of the case involves dividing the assets among the parties each party is assigned a specific share of ownership and the value of each share is determined the case concludes with an agreement to terminate the existing coownership and divide the assets accordingly the specific shares of ownership and their corresponding values are outlined
